title: How to Get GitHub Access
content: Raise a request to the IT team. Once approved, accept the GitHub invite and clone the repository.

title: How to Setup Project Environment
content: Install Node.js, clone the project repository, run npm install, and start the server.

title: Employee Leave Policy Overview
author: HR Team
content:
Employees are entitled to casual, sick, and earned leave.
Leave requests must be submitted through the HR portal.
Approval depends on manager confirmation.
